name: Send text messages via Z-API for new rows in Google Sheets
description: Streamline your communication process by automatically sending text messages through Z-API whenever a new row is added in Google Sheets. This template ensures that important updates or notifications are instantly communicated, enhancing your team's responsiveness and efficiency. Perfect for tracking leads, project updates, or any critical information that needs immediate attention. Just set up your Google Sheets with the necessary data structure, and let the automation handle the rest.
